thread.section_title: eSpares.co.uk Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.espares.co.uk
thread.title: Thomas Rooke

author: Thomas Rooke
title: Thomas Rooke
text:
Ordered a new fan for our Hotpoint oven, web site, price & delivery very good, however I had one problem with this order.
As instructed I entered the oven model in and up came a range of fans, including eSpares alternative, a very reasonable priced fan which I ordered. However it was not compatible as the fan shaft was to long.
As advised by eSpares I reordered the correct fan (more expensive). To be fair to eSpares the replacement arrived very quickly as did the credit for the other fan & postage. Yes I would use eSpares again but I would take time to study their compatible parts in more detail
